short_summary: Provision of Diving Services for Trent Severn Waterway National Historic Site.
description: The Contractor must provide diving services for the investigation, operation, and construction of the Trent Severn Waterway's infrastructure.
duration_in_months: +12 month(s) with the option of an additional 36 month(s)
full_summary: # Government Tender Announcement ## Provision of Diving Services for Trent Severn Waterway National Historic Site ### SRV Competitive Bidding Opportunity #### Solicitation Number: 5P300-23-0451/A #### Amendment Number: 5 #### Amendment Date: March 12, 2024 The Parks Canada Agency is seeking a Contractor to provide diving services for the Trent Severn Waterway National Historic Site. The successful Contractor will provide diving services and dive supervision for investigation, operation, and construction requirements within the site. ### Contract Details * **Contract Period**: From April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2025, with an option to extend for three additional years. * **Bidder Responsibilities**: + Provide diving services and dive supervision for the site's infrastructure, including locks, dams, bridges, and canal walls. + Comply with applicable federal and provincial regulations, including the Competency Standard for Diving Operations (CAN/CSA Z275.4-12) and the Occupational Safety Code for Diving Operations (CAN/CSA Z275.2-11). * **Submission Guidelines**: + Bids must be submitted via email or fax, as specified in the solicitation document. + Emails or faxes received in-person or via courier will not be accepted. + The maximum file size for emails is 15 megabytes. ### Important Dates * **Tender Closing Date**: March 12, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST. * **Contract Award**: To be determined. ### Contact Information * **Contracting Authority**: Parks Canada * **Contact Person**: Bonnie Knott * **Email Address**: [bonnie.knott@pc.gc.ca](mailto:bonnie.knott@pc.gc.ca) * **Phone Number**: (709) 636-4953 Please submit all inquiries or proposals to the specified email address or fax number. Parks Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Note: Please refer to the original documents for the full solicitation package and addenda. Bidders must ensure they have the most up-to-date information to avoid any issues or delays. Best address to email the bid is soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca address.
